channel.title: INall
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INall, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Reasons Why You're Always Thirsty
item.description: It’s normal to feel thirsty after heat or exercise. But if thirst doesn’t go away, it could be a sign of something more. Find out what to watch for.

item.description: Rami Malek's latest film, The Amateur, features a refreshing approach to the spy thriller genre that more action movies of its kind should emulate.

item.title: Robert Redford's 10 Best Movies, Ranked

item.title: I begged my adviser to sell amid the market turmoil. He dragged his feet and I lost $20,000. Do I have any recourse?
item.description: “If he had moved my money out of the market weeks ago, much of my loss could have been prevented.”

item.title: Which Version Of Galadriel Is The Most Powerful: LOTR Vs. The Hobbit Vs. The Rings Of Power
item.description: We've now seen Galadriel at three different points in Middle-earth's timeline, and though she's always powerful, he strength isn't entirely equal.

item.title: Are Seed Oils Bad for You?
Overly bearish investors risk writing off 2025 too soon. These strategies offer upside and downside protection.
item.description: Ed Yardeni argues that, to match the doom and gloom from Wall Street bears, the stock market would need to see a Lehman-esque meltdown.
